<LI>Additionally, through XSLT you can effectively handle a lot of your 
business logic that is typically found in the 
middle tier of 
three-tier architectures. Thus XSLT can be seen as an addition to 
COM Objects as a means to produce sophisticated 
web applications.
 </LI>
<LI>a</LI>
<LI>b</LI>
<LI>ab</LI>
